title: Bug 109283Invalid "indirect static access" warning on EnumSet.noneOf
description: Bug 109283Invalid "indirect static access" warning on EnumSet.noneOf
OB: When compiling AspectJ enabled projects in Java 5.0 source mode with "Indirectaccess to static modifier" warnings on, the following code incorrectly gives acompiler warning (this doesn't occur in nonAspectJ enabled projects):public class Test {enum Foo {Wibble,Wobble,Woo;}public static void main(String[] args) {EnumSet<Foo set = EnumSet.noneOf(Foo.class);}}
SR: When compiling AspectJ enabled projects in Java 5.0 source mode with "Indirectaccess to static modifier" warnings on, the following code incorrectly gives acompiler warning (this doesn't occur in nonAspectJ enabled projects):public class Test {enum Foo {Wibble,Wobble,Woo;}public static void main(String[] args) {EnumSet<Foo set = EnumSet.noneOf(Foo.class);}}
